carousel_slide1_h4: | ONE OF THE MOST PROLIFIC ORGANIZATIONS FOR SENDING MISSIONARIES TO AFRICA.
carousel_slide1_p: God urges all Christians to be integrated into His divine vision and achieve His goal. All actions undertaken must be accomplished in authenticity, honesty, and through integrity.
carousel_slide2_h4: | SPREAD THE GOSPEL WITHIN SOCIETY. MOBILIZE THE CHURCH TO FORM DISCIPLES
carousel_slide2_p: Evangelization and discipleship are the foundations of the mission. This is what is called 'THE EMINENT MISSION' accomplishing this is the reason for being and the reason for living of Christians.
carousel_slide3_h4: | EVERY CHRISTIAN SHOULD TRANSFORM INTO A MISSIONARY DISCIPLE
carousel_slide3_p: When Christians appropriate and put the gospel into practice, God's plan is accomplished more quickly. In this sense, the responsibility of Christians is both heavy and crucial.
carousel_slide4_h4: | MALAGASY PREACH THE GOSPEL TO THE MALAGASY PEOPLE, SUPPORTED BY MALAGASY AND PROMOTES MUTUAL AID
carousel_slide4_p: Malagasy preach the gospel to the Malagasy people. The mission is supported by Malagasy, and promotes solidarity and mutual aid.
carousel_slide5_h4: | A HOLISTIC DEVELOPMENT PROCESS, BASED ON BIBLICAL VALUES AND ADAPTED TO MALAGASY CULTURE
carousel_slide5_p: Western missionaries, bearers of the Gospel to Madagascar, have brought the light. They have fulfilled their responsibilities, and Malagasy churches are making the necessary efforts to ensure continuity. 'You cannot build a house with one hand alone', so every support is welcome. Real Mission Movement values teamwork and warmly welcomes any partnership.
carousel_slide6_h4: | HOLISTIC DEVELOPMENT PROCESS ADAPTED TO MALAGASY VALUES
carousel_slide6_p: The Gospel will constitute a fundamental value of Malagasy identity, being transmitted from generation to generation and guaranteeing harmonious and sustainable development for the nation.
carousel_slide7_h4: | HOLISTIC DEVELOPMENT PROCESS ADAPTED TO MALAGASY VALUES
carousel_slide7_p: Promote positive transformation, including a change in mentality, method, and behavior.
carousel_slide8_p: Each household appropriates the gospel and uses it to make decisions favoring the growth and sustainable development of each family member.
carousel_slide9_p: The gospel is adopted by leaders at all levels as a tool for leadership and management for community development.
hero_title: The real mission for the real Gospel
founder_p1:
Development is accelerating rapidly in this world. – Technology is growing and evolving quickly. Human society is submerging in its own concept of evolution. Evolving towards where? On what? The accomplishment of the gospel has proven itself everywhere and in various aspects of humanity.
And this is heading towards its failure (Eph.5.16b).
founder_p2: On that, we can testify that Jesus Christ has never changed (Heb.13.8). His message to humanity has not changed at all. He commands his disciples to preach the gospel to every man in the whole world (Mar.16.15), to make the earthly nations his disciples (Mat.28.19), and to be his unfailing witnesses to the ends of the earth … (Acts.1.8)
founder_p3: Real Mission Movement realizes what has been said, accomplishes 'the authentic mission and the true gospel'
footer_desc: God urges all Christians to be integrated into His divine vision and achieve His goal. All actions undertaken must be accomplished in authenticity, honesty, and through integrity.
